CitationTriplet - Class in edu.harvard.chs.cite
A CitationTriplet is the object representation of the three pieces of information mapping a given level of a citation scheme onto a validating schema.

CtsUrn - Class in edu.harvard.chs.cite

CtsUrn.WorkLevel - Enum in edu.harvard.chs.cite
